text: Cun munofiqon nazdi tu ojand, (ʙo zaʙonason) gujand: «Sahodat (guvohi) medihem, ki tu harojina, pajomʙari Alloh hasti». Alʙatta, Alloh medonad, ki tu pajomʙaras hasti va Alloh sahodat medihad, ki harojina, munofiqon duruƣgujand (on ci ʙarojat zohir kardaand ʙo zaʙonason, vale dar dil kufrro pinhon dostaand)
